item.title: Microsoft Cost Management updates—July & August 2025
item.description: You need to know what you’re spending, where your money is being spent, and how to plan for the future. Nobody wants a surprise bill—and that’s where Microsoft Cost Management comes in. The post Microsoft Cost Management updates—July & August 2025 appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog. Link to article: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/microsoft-cost-management-updates-july-august-2025/
